• Multiplayer UNO game using MQTT for real-time communication.
  • Browser-based with pure JavaScript, no backend required.
  • Features include custom card creation, chat, and theme switching.
    const client = mqtt.connect(state.brokerUrl, { clientId: `uno_${state.myId}` });
    client.subscribe([`${topicBase}/state`, `${topicBase}/chat`, `${topicBase}/presence`]);

This is a browser-based UNO game that uses MQTT for real-time multiplayer gameplay. Players connect to public brokers, join rooms, and play with custom cards. The game features a lobby system, chat functionality, and theme switching between light and dark modes.
